column4: I need a connection to the net I mean wireless but for that I downloaded ndiswrapper but also I need ndisgtk where can I find it
chuy people talk so much in black I don't know what to reafd!!!
PEOPLE WHEN U ANSWER MY QUESTION PLEASE QUOT MY NAME SO THAT i KNOW WHERE IS MY ANSWER
I need a connection to the net I mean wireless but for that I downloaded ndiswrapper but also I need ndisgtk where can I find it
IN ORDER TO HAVE ONE i NEED AN INTERNET CONNECTION
You have been told the answer multiple times. If you are not going to read our answers, we will not help you any more,.
There's a direct download link for the debian installer file.
Not needed. Just double-click the .deb file and it'll open up an installer app.
Don't try to open it as a text file. Save it as a binary file.
Another link? The one I gave before works fine for me.
If that one isn't working for some odd reason, try http://ubuntu.mirrors.tds.net/ubuntu/pool/main/n/ndisgtk/ndisgtk_0.8.3-1_i386.deb
You need to copy it over to your Ubuntu box and then double-click it.
